newsitem.title: USA: Brunswick names controller, effective today.
newsitem.headline: Brunswick names controller, effective today.

text.p: Brunswick Corp said Monday that Victoria Reich, 39, has been named vice president - controller, effective immediately.

Before joining Brunswick, Reich held several financial and managerial positions in a 17-year career with the General Electric Co. Most recently she served as the head of finance for GE's wiring devices business.
Reich succeeds Thomas Erwin who resigned three months ago.

Brunswick serves the outdoor and indoor active recreation markets with consumer products that include fishing tackle, camping gear, bicycles, bowling centers and billiards tables. The company also makes boats and engines.
